cardioWorkouts.name: Running
cardioWorkouts.instructions: Go for a jog or run at a steady pace for 20-30 minutes to elevate your heart rate and improve cardiovascular endurance.

cardioWorkouts.name: Jump Rope
cardioWorkouts.instructions: Jump rope continuously for 10-15 minutes, focusing on maintaining a consistent pace and rhythm.

cardioWorkouts.name: Cycling
cardioWorkouts.instructions: Pedal on a stationary bike or ride a bicycle outdoors for 30-45 minutes, adjusting resistance as needed.

cardioWorkouts.name: High-Intensity Interval Training (HIIT)
cardioWorkouts.instructions: Perform a series of intense exercises with short rest intervals, such as burpees, jumping jacks, and mountain climbers, for 15-20 minutes.

cardioWorkouts.name: Swimming
cardioWorkouts.instructions: Swim laps using different strokes for an overall body workout and improved cardiovascular fitness.

waistWorkouts.name: Russian Twists
waistWorkouts.instructions: Sit on the floor, lean back slightly, and twist your torso from side to side while holding the weight.

waistWorkouts.name: Bicycle Crunches
waistWorkouts.instructions: Lie on your back, lift your legs off the ground, and bring one knee towards your chest while simultaneously twisting your torso to touch the opposite elbow.

waistWorkouts.name: Side Plank
waistWorkouts.instructions: Support your body on one elbow and feet, keeping your body straight and hold the position for 30-60 seconds on each side.

waistWorkouts.name: Hanging Leg Raises
waistWorkouts.instructions: Hang from a bar and lift your legs up towards your chest, then lower them down slowly without swinging.

waistWorkouts.name: Woodchoppers
waistWorkouts.instructions: Stand sideways to the cable machine or anchor a resistance band, then pull the handle diagonally across your body as if you are chopping wood.

chestWorkouts.name: Bench Press
chestWorkouts.instructions: Lie on a bench, grip the barbell or dumbbells, and lower the weight to your chest before pressing it back up.

chestWorkouts.name: Push-Ups
chestWorkouts.instructions: Assume a plank position, lower your body by bending your elbows, and then push back up.

chestWorkouts.name: Dumbbell Flyes
chestWorkouts.instructions: Lie on a flat bench with dumbbells in hand, extend your arms out to your sides, and then bring them back up, hugging an imaginary tree.

chestWorkouts.name: Chest Dips
chestWorkouts.instructions: Support your body on parallel bars, lower yourself by bending your elbows, and then push back up.

chestWorkouts.name: Cable Chest Press
chestWorkouts.instructions: Stand facing the cable machine, grab the handles, and press them forward while keeping your arms parallel to the ground.

armsWorkouts.name: Bicep Curls
armsWorkouts.instructions: Hold the dumbbells or barbell with palms facing up, curl the weight towards your shoulders, and then lower it back down.

armsWorkouts.name: Tricep Dips
armsWorkouts.instructions: Support your body on parallel bars, lower yourself by bending your elbows, and then push back up.

armsWorkouts.name: Hammer Curls
armsWorkouts.instructions: Hold dumbbells with palms facing inward, curl the weights towards your shoulders, and then lower them back down.

armsWorkouts.name: Skull Crushers
armsWorkouts.instructions: Lie on a bench with a barbell, lower the weight towards your forehead, and then extend your arms back up.

armsWorkouts.name: Preacher Curls
armsWorkouts.equipment: Preacher Curl Bench, Dumbbell or EZ-Bar
armsWorkouts.instructions: Sit on the preacher curl bench, hold the weight with palms facing up, and curl it towards your shoulders.

backWorkouts.name: Deadlifts
backWorkouts.instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bend at the hips and knees, and lift the weight while keeping your back straight.

backWorkouts.name: Pull-Ups
backWorkouts.instructions: Hang from a bar with an overhand grip, pull your body up until your chin is above the bar, and then lower yourself down.

backWorkouts.name: Seated Cable Rows
backWorkouts.instructions: Sit at a cable machine, hold the handles, and pull them towards your abdomen, squeezing your shoulder blades together.

backWorkouts.name: One-Arm Dumbbell Rows
backWorkouts.instructions: Place one knee and hand on a bench, hold a dumbbell in the other hand, and pull it towards your abdomen.

backWorkouts.name: Supermans
backWorkouts.instructions: Lie face down, extend your arms and legs off the ground, and lift them as high as you can to engage your lower back.

shouldersWorkouts.name: Shoulder Press
shouldersWorkouts.instructions: Sit on a bench or stand, hold the weights at shoulder height, and press them upward until your arms are fully extended.

shouldersWorkouts.name: Lateral Raises
shouldersWorkouts.instructions: Stand with dumbbells by your sides, raise them out to your sides until they are parallel to the ground, and then lower them back down.

shouldersWorkouts.name: Front Raises
shouldersWorkouts.instructions: Hold dumbbells in front of your thighs, raise them straight up to shoulder height, and then lower them back down.

shouldersWorkouts.name: Upright Rows
shouldersWorkouts.instructions: Hold the barbell or dumbbells with palms facing your body, pull them up towards your chin, and then lower them back down.

shouldersWorkouts.name: Arnold Press
shouldersWorkouts.instructions: Start with dumbbells at shoulder height, rotate them as you press overhead, and then reverse the motion on the way down.

thighsWorkouts.name: Squats
thighsWorkouts.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower your body by bending your knees, and then return to the starting position.

thighsWorkouts.name: Lunges
thighsWorkouts.instructions: Take a step forward, lower your body until both knees are bent at 90-degree angles, then push back up to the starting position.

thighsWorkouts.name: Leg Press
thighsWorkouts.instructions: Sit on a leg press machine, push the weight away by extending your legs, and then return to the starting position.

thighsWorkouts.name: Step-ups
thighsWorkouts.instructions: Step onto a box or step with one leg, push through your heel to stand on top, and then step back down.

thighsWorkouts.name: Romanian Deadlifts
thighsWorkouts.instructions: Hold the barbell or dumbbells with palms facing your body, hinge at the hips, and lower the weight down while keeping your back straight.

absWorkouts.name: Crunches
absWorkouts.instructions: Lie on your back, bend your knees, and lift your upper body towards your knees.

absWorkouts.name: Plank
absWorkouts.instructions: Hold a push-up position with arms straight and body in a straight line from head to heels.

absWorkouts.name: Hanging Leg Raises
absWorkouts.instructions: Hang from a bar and lift your legs up towards your chest, then lower them down slowly without swinging.

absWorkouts.name: Russian Twists
absWorkouts.instructions: Sit on the floor, lean back slightly, and twist your torso from side to side while holding the weight.

absWorkouts.name: Reverse Crunches
absWorkouts.instructions: Lie on your back, lift your legs off the ground, and bring your knees towards your chest while lifting your hips off the ground.

calvesWorkouts.name: Calf Raises
calvesWorkouts.instructions: Stand on a calf raise machine or on the edge of a step, rise up on your toes, and then lower back down.

calvesWorkouts.name: Seated Calf Raises
calvesWorkouts.instructions: Sit on a calf raise machine or a bench, place the balls of your feet on the platform or weights, and then raise your heels.

calvesWorkouts.name: Jump Rope
calvesWorkouts.instructions: Jump rope continuously for 10-15 minutes, focusing on maintaining a consistent pace and rhythm.

calvesWorkouts.name: Box Jumps
calvesWorkouts.instructions: Stand in front of a box or platform, jump onto it, and then step back down.

calvesWorkouts.name: Calf Stretch
calvesWorkouts.instructions: Stand near a wall or on a step, place one foot back with the heel on the ground, and lean forward to stretch your calf muscles.

neckWorkouts.name: Neck Flexion
neckWorkouts.instructions: Sit or stand, place your hands on your forehead, and apply gentle pressure while pushing your head forward.

neckWorkouts.name: Neck Extension
neckWorkouts.instructions: Sit or stand, place your hands on the back of your head, and apply gentle pressure while pushing your head backward.

neckWorkouts.name: Neck Lateral Flexion
neckWorkouts.instructions: Sit or stand, tilt your head sideways to the left by bringing your left ear towards your left shoulder, then repeat on the right side.

neckWorkouts.name: Neck Resistance Training
neckWorkouts.instructions: Sit or stand with a partner or a resistance band behind you, resist against the pressure as they push your head in different directions.

neckWorkouts.name: Neck Rotations
neckWorkouts.instructions: Sit or stand, turn your head to the left and right, moving your chin towards your shoulder on each side.
